meanings.definition: Resembling a rib in shape or function.
meanings.sent1: The boat had riblike structures along its sides for added support.
meanings.sent2: The doctor pointed out the riblike markings on the X-ray.
meanings.sent3: The riblike design of the bridge made it look like a giant ribcage.
meanings.sent4: Her riblike fingers delicately picked up the fragile object.
meanings.sent5: The riblike shadows cast by the fence created a mesmerizing pattern on the ground.
